## Research Assistant Recruitmentï½œGovernment Procurement Ã— Social Equity Ã— Data Science

Are you interested in exploring public policy using real-world data?

Curious how governments spend billions on procurement every year?
Interested in unlocking the black box of government contracting?

Join Professor Yung-Yu Tsaiâ€™s research project at NCCUâ€™s International College of Innovation!

------

**Number of Positions**: 2â€“3  
**Salary**: NTD 8,000â€“12,000 per month (depending on experience, workload, and hours; salary adjustment based on performance)  
**Eligibility**: Undergraduate or graduate students enrolled in a university; non-NCCU students must provide institutional approval form upon hiring  
**Work Location**: Remote or on campus (National Chengchi University)  
**Work Time**: 8-10 hours/week; flexible

<div style="line-height:50%;"><br></div>

**Research Topics**

This project investigates how governments balance efficiency and equity in the procurement (outsourcing) process.

You will be exposed to several research topics, including:

1. Effects of administrative measures in government procurement on bidding incentives, implementation processes, and outcomes

2. Impact of preferred procurement policies for shelter workshops and disability-serving organization on fairness and efficiency

3. Influence of procurement committee composition on evaluation results and awardees

4. Factors affecting public agencies' procurement of sustainable suppliers or environmentally certified products

These topics connect public administration, data analysis, social equity, and sustainability---all of which are hot and growing research areas in international public policy scholarship.
Students interested in government procurement, public-private collaboration, social equity, and sustainability are welcome!

------

### Types of RA Roles (Assigned based on ability & interest)

#### A. Administrative Assistant

**Responsibilities:**

- Handle procurement, reimbursement, and related paperwork

- Contact relevant university/internal units, send documents, reserve meeting rooms  

**Requirements:**

- Proficiency in Microsoft Word & Excel

- Strong Mandarin Chinese communication capability

<div style="line-height:50%;"><br></div>

#### B. Literature Review & Data Collection Assistant

**Responsibilities:**

- Collect, organize, and compare literature, policies, cases, and statistical data

- Assist with typesetting, proofreading, formatting reports  

**Requirements:**

- Proficiency in Microsoft Word & Excel

- Strong English reading ability (Chinese not required)

- Interest in at least one project topic

<div style="line-height:50%;"><br></div>

#### C. Data Processing & Analysis Assistant

**Responsibilities:**

- Data cleaning and statistical analysis

- Web scraping tasks (if interested/able)

**Requirements:**

- Familiarity with at least one statistical software (R, Stata, Python) or willingness to learn

- Basic Chinese reading ability (translation tools allowed)

- Interest in big data analytics, text mining, web scraping, or related topics

------

### What You Will Gain

- Hands-on experience in social science research  

- Skills in data analysis & policy evaluation  

- Academic mentoring and career advice  

- Strong advantage for graduate school or job applications
